title: Sustainability-Integrated Mathematics Instructional Design: Activity-Based Learning Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts (Statistics, Functions, Data Analysis) and General Understanding of Sustainability
context.additional_context: A blended environment combining self-directed learning and group collaboration via online platforms, focusing on solving real-life sustainability issues linked to math curricula.

learning_goals: Learners can transform and interpret sustainability-related data using mathematical tools (statistics, graph analysis).
Learners can propose solutions that connect mathematical concepts with sustainability goals (SDGs) through activity-based projects.
Learners can understand the interactions of sustainability values and apply systems thinking through mathematical modeling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
